means: 小口鳕，黑线鳕（产于北大西洋的食用鱼）
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 哈多克职业名称，鱼贩子，或绰号，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“小口鳕”(haddock)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 哈多克中世纪沿用的古英语人名，含义是“繁荣，幸运”(prosperity,fortune)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 哈多克住所名称，来源于古英语，含义是“石南+钩”(heath+hook)

sentence.Network_en: Use Scottish smoked haddock if you can.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果可以的话就用苏格兰熏黑线鳕。

sentence.Network_en: Yes. Haddock and chips for me, please.
sentence.Network_cn: 好,给我熏黑线鳕和炸土豆片.

sentence.Network_en: Fish such as cod, flounder, and haddock are caught in this way.
sentence.Network_cn: 鳕 、 比目鱼 、 黑线鳕等都是用这种方法捕捞的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French hadoc, from Old French hadot, of unknown origin

entry.tran: 黑线鳕（产于北大西洋海域的一种食用鱼）
entry.def: Haddock are a type of edible sea fish that are found in the North Atlantic.

example.ex: ...fishing boats which normally catch a mix of cod, haddock and whiting.
example.tran: 通常每次都会捕捞上一堆鳕鱼、黑线鳕及牙鳕的渔船

means.word_mean: 1. lean white flesh of fish similar to but smaller than cod; usually baked or poached or as fillets sauteed or fried
2. important food fish on both sides of the Atlantic; related to cod but usually smaller
